input.sentences: the view from our hotel room is amazing .
we can see all the trees and nature .
but also the bay and buildings .
if you look close enough you can even see fish in the water .
i want to stay here forever and never go home .
output.sentences: We couldn't believe such a large and beautiful city could be in such a remote location.
The trees still had their foliage as the sun was high in the sky.
The calm bay was a welcome harbor for world travelers.
The sea even reflected the colors of the land.
As we departed, the city offered more spectacular views.
